column4: most settings on linux for your install stuff are in hidden directories in your /home directory.. Open Places>Home and then ctrl+h to reveal the hidden directories.. they start with a period (.)..
i know where the settings file is, its stored in WoWinstallfolder\wtf\account.wtf
is there a way to make transparent folder links so that MOST of the subfolders are shared, but the main folder and the settings folder were stored on the linux drive?
sorry joined the channel late and didn't have access to any of your previous posts..
